name: 1v1 Me
summary: JUST. PLAY. BETTER. Use your powers as a living machine to shoot, dash, and slash through enemies as you outplay your opponents in a duel to the death in the dark. 1v1 Me is an easy to learn, but difficult to master arena fighter! Surpass your limits, right here, right now in 1v1 Me!

name: 1v1.LOL
summary: Sharpen your building skills, fight in epic Battle Royale and 1v1 battles against players in your skill level and try to be the last player left standing!

name: 1 Vs 1
summary: You must deceive your enemy and be ahead. Your magic and potions will help you with that. You can buy potions in shops with golden coins gained from exchanging wood, stones and meat.

name: 1 vs. 100
summary: 1 vs. 100 was a massively multiplayer online Xbox Live adaptation of the trivia game show of the same name.

name: 1 vs. 100
summary: 1 vs. 100 is a Plug It In & Play TV Game based off the game show of the same name developed by Pronto Games released by Jakks Pacific in 2006.

name: 1v1 Cube Game
summary: 1v1 Cube Game with portal and snow balls. To win you need to land on the secend player's head or shoot him with a snow ball.

name: 1v1 Battle
summary: Master your Battle Royale skills with 1v1Battle - Play live build fight battles against real opponents, get your performance statistics report, practice your building, editing, shooting skills, and much more!

name: 1vs1: Battle Royale for the throne
summary: Enjoy the exciting story of the confrontation of the crown princes in they battle for the throne. Complete the test in the ancient temple caves to prove your right to the royal throne!

name: 1 vs. 1 Football Tournament
summary: 1 vs 1 Football Tournament is a fast-paced game that puts your football skills to the test.
